EngLawName: Regulations for the Methods of Broadcasting Advertisements and the Distribution of the Number of Advertisements of Radio and Television Businesses.
name: 廣播電視廣告播送方式與數量分配辦法
histories: 3 articles promulgated by National Communications Commission on December 7, 2016 in accordance with the order Tong-Chuan-Nei-Rong No. 10548034940, and enacted from the day of promulgation.

articles.content: These regulations are enacted in accordance with Paragraph 4, Article 31 of the Cable Radio and Television Act.

A segment of advertisements may be inserted twice in programs that last up to 30 minutes, three times in programs that last up to 45 minutes, and four times in programs that last up to 60 minutes. For the broadcasting of live events, advertisements may be inserted at appropriate times.
These regulations shall take effect from the date of promulgation.
